Ustawi Nourishing Cleansing Balm

Brand: Ustawi

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isopropyl Myristate, Glycerin, C10-18 Triglycerides, Water, Sucrose Laurate, Sucrose Stearate, Silica, Levulinic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Glucosyl Hesperidin, Sodium Levulinate, Ascorbyl Glucoside, H

scorbyl Glucoside, Hexylresorcinol, Propanediol, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Extract, Adansonia Digitata Fruit Extract, Myrtus Communis Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
